hero.title: Build Your Perfect CV in
hero.subtitle: Create professional resumes with our CV builder. Stand out from the crowd and land your dream job.

features.title: Everything you need
features.subtitle: Professional tools to create standout resumes

templates.title: Professional Templates
templates.desc: Choose from carefully crafted designs for every industry

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.desc: Work comfortably day or night with full theme support

pdf.title: PDF Export
pdf.desc: Download your CV as a pixel-perfect PDF ready to send

i18n.title: Bilingual Support
i18n.desc: Create your CV in English or Polish with one click

autosave.title: Auto-Save
autosave.desc: Your progress is automatically saved — never lose your work

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.desc: All data stays in your browser — nothing is sent to any server

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Create your professional CV in three simple steps
howItWorks.step1Desc: Select from our collection of professional designs
howItWorks.step2Desc: Add your information using our simple form
howItWorks.step3Desc: Export as PDF and start applying to jobs

templateShowcase.title: Choose Your Style
templateShowcase.subtitle: Three professionally designed templates for different industries

cta.title: Ready to build your CV?
cta.subtitle: Create a professional resume in minutes — completely free, no sign-up required.

templates.title: CV Templates
templates.pageSubtitle: Select a template that best represents your professional style

developer.name: Developer Template
developer.description: Tech-focused design with monospace font and developer-friendly styling

default.name: Default Template
default.description: Modern minimalist design with Montserrat font for professionals

veterinary.name: Veterinary Template
veterinary.description: Professional medical design with caring touches for animal healthcare specialists

progress.title: Form Progress
progress.complete: Great! Your CV is complete. Click 'Preview CV' to see the result.
progress.incomplete: Complete all sections to maximize your CV's impact.

validation.fixErrors: Please fix the errors above before proceeding.

placeholders.description: Start typing to add your first point...

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: Your basic contact information and professional summary

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.description: Add your professional experience (drag to reorder)

education.title: Education
education.description: Add your educational background (drag to reorder)

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Add your professional skills (drag to reorder)

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: Add languages you speak (drag to reorder)

interests.title: Interests
interests.description: Add your hobbies and interests (drag to reorder)

gdprConsent.title: GDPR Consent Clause
gdprConsent.description: Add a GDPR data processing consent clause to the bottom of your CV
gdprConsent.enable: Include GDPR consent clause in CV
gdprConsent.companyNameHint: Leave empty for a generic clause without a company name

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

reset.title: Reset CV Data
reset.description: Are you sure you want to reset all your CV data? This action cannot be undone and all your information will be permanently deleted.

preview.title: Your CV Preview
preview.noDataHint: Please fill out the form first to preview your CV.

success.title: Congratulations! Your CV is ready.
success.subtitle: You can now download as PDF or continue editing.

contentWarning.title: Content is very long
contentWarning.subtitle: Your CV has been scaled to the minimum (50%). Consider reducing content for better readability.

preview.exportError: Failed to export PDF. Please try again.

cv.gdprConsent: I hereby give my consent for my personal data included in my CV to be processed for the purposes of the recruitment process conducted by {{companyName}} in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council (GDPR).
cv.gdprConsentGeneric: I hereby give my consent for my personal data included in my CV to be processed for the purposes of the recruitment process in accordance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council (GDPR).
